= Download: Base Install =

A base install requires a clean AP install, so read and follow the [Installation installation guide] carefully. Due to the number of changes LU makes to X3AP, failure to do so will fuck up your install.

The base install comes in two parts, both will wipe certain X3/addon directories clean:

  * Base install wipes X3\addon\loadscr<br>
  * Base install wipes X3\addon\scripts<br>
  * Soundtrack install wipes X3\soundtrack<br><br>

[http://litcube.xtimelines.net/download.php?File=LitcubesUniverseV1.3.0.exe Litcube's Universe V1.3.0]
<br><br>

[http://litcube.xtimelines.net/download.php?File=LUSoundtrackV1.0.0.exe Litcube's Universe Soundtrack V1.0.0]

= Export/Import Package =
[http://litcube.xtimelines.net/download.php?File=LitcubesUniverseEIV1.3.3.exe Litcube's Universe Export/Import Package V1.3.3]

In an endeavour to eliminate the incremental patching, and the confusion over when to export at which patch etc., EI scripts are now externalized.

Example: If you were going from V1.2.5 to V1.3.3

  * Install latest EI
  * Export game
  * Patch to version 1.3.3
  * Import game
